s: 19-Watt mug warmer for use with any hot beverages like coffee, tea, milk, etc. Built-in gravity induction switch, just place your mug on it, it will automatically turn on, no need to turn it on/off manually. Always keep your hot coffee or tea at a drinkable temperature (131F/55C).
